issue.title: www.huffpost.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
> Kaspersky Endpoint Security для Windows v.12.8.0.505 и AdGuard for Windows v7.20.1 (4966) конфликтуют из за компонента _Фильтрация HTTPS_ кто из них виноват непонятно, но по отдельности запущенные программы документы открываются!!!!!

Здравствуйте. В этом случае должно помочь создание взаимных исключений в обеих программах. 

В AdGuard перейдите в "Настройки → Основные настройки → Расширенные настройки” и найдите пункт “Исключите приложение из фильтрации, введя полный путь”. Добавьте в строку ниже пути к процессам антивируса. Например: `C:\Program Files\ESET\ESET Smart Security\x86\ekrn.exe`

В список исключений Kaspersky нужно добавить службы приложения `AdguardSvc.exe` и `Adguard.exe`. По умолчанию путь к ним выглядит следующим образом: `C:\Program Files\AdGuard`

После этого перезагрузите устройство и проверьте, сохраняется ли проблема.

comment.body:
Niestety to jest znowu problem z nieaktualnymi filtrami w rozszerzeniu i brakiem możliwości ich aktualizacji.
Zostało to naprawione 2 albo 3 dni temu a filtry są z 10 marca.

Dodaj proszę do reguł użytkownika:
```adblock
wp.pl#%#//scriptlet('trusted-prune-inbound-object', 'Object.entries', '*.slots')
wiadomosci.wp.pl##body > #root > div[class]:empty
```

issue.title: bilibli
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://dl.hdslb.com/mobile/latest/android64/iBiliPlayer-bili.apk?t=20250314&spm_id_from=333.47.b_646f776e6c6f61642d6c696e6b.1

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

你看下面的图片，软件通过IP地址绕过规则，host后面的网址已经被Adguard dns规则禁止了，于是就通过IP地址绕过规则。而且host后面的网址也会变化，同时会有一定的规律。所以可以用这一条规则来禁止url。  `||*resolve?host=*biliapi.net*`
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/444db155-3015-4e60-a86d-77d25ac5c336)

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

Also not reproduced on my end. Maybe too many filters has been enabled? Try to leave only these,
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Mobile Ads
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese
```
then update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pkg2.zhimg.com/zhihu-dispatch/futureve-app-market(zhihuwap64)-release-10.42.1(24210)-arm64-v8a-bangcle.apk

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

umeng的中文名也叫“友盟”，这个公司是提供数据分析和统计服务，收集分析用户数据，常用于广告服务，广告商就通过这个公司获得用户数据的，建议禁止。要禁止cnlogs.umeng.com

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f390c12a-436f-4e03-aeef-ccea65987612)
还有一个域名ulogs.umeng.com，我不知道这个域名有没有在列表中，如果没有的话，顺便也添加这个域名，这个域名不在上面那个软件中，是我从其它地方收集到的。我觉得这两个域名可以添加到Adguard基础过滤器和Adguard DNS过滤器

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will break configuration process.

Включить DNS-защиту в Adguard. > 2. Убедиться, что выбран сервер Adguard-DNS. > 3. Запустить приложение Twitch с авторизованным аккаунтом с холодного старта. > 4. Нажать на кнопку «Отслеживается» или перейти на любую вкладку приложения. > > Фактическое поведение: > Лента Twitch не прогружается при включённой DNS-защите. > > Ожидаемое поведение: > Лента Twitch прогружается при включённой DNS-защите. comment.body:
Здравствуйте!

13.03.2025 17:50, Alex пишет:
> А если выбрать нефильтрующий DNS из списка?

Выбрал AdGuard DNS без фильтрации - не помогло.

> Какая реализация DNS выбрана?

AdGuard.

> В каком состоянии опция Раздельное Туннелирование в расширенных настройках?

Split-tunnel.

> Если эти опции переключить по отдельности, проблема сохраняется?

Попереключал опции раздельного туннелирования - не помогло.

> Подозреваю, что что-то локально идёт не так, иначе бы завалили жалобами. 
> Можно попробовать сброс настроек и проверить с дефолтными (вкл 
> фильтрацию DNS).

Сбросил настройки. При выбранной реализации DNS "AdGuard" и DNS-сервере 
"Системный (Обычный)" все работает. Но я не знаю, насколько он блокирует 
все трекеры.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

### Comment
> I am using Adguard DNS (https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query) from chome "use secure DNS" option. Usually I don't see ad on this website but now I get this ad. 
> 
> link of the image used in this ad: https://creatives.cdnbo.org/vmrj7WC-1d99fcf3a19b4243588c3508afb47418a4e6ccfc.jpg
> 
> Where it takes when clicked on the image: https://hakurei.cdnbo.org/gate?r=WhOmUsSPLc&d=27&dest=aiuncensored.info&p=pol 
> 
> which later redirects to another Website. 
> 
> I guess blocking https://creatives.cdnbo.org/ and https://hakurei.cdnbo.org/ should get the job done. 
> 
> Maybe block https://cdnbo.org/ as a whole. It seems like an website dedicated to ads.
